name: Super Metal Crusher
overview: By the 24th century, humans have picked up on a sport that involves robots battling each other in an arena. There are twelves robots to choose from. Each robot has 4 statistics and 15 character traits. The traits can be modified and allocated by the number of leftover points the player currently has. In the grid-based arena, the player can utilize the robot's powers for attack and defense moves with the goal of beating all eleven robots for the number one rank.
